full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: W0125-23WR10 POL Automotive Products
#### Solicitation B
#### Reference Number: WS3780198838-Doc3781322878

**Details**
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3780198838
* **Publication Date:** December 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date/Time:** December 19, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date/Time:** January 1, 2023 
* **Expected Contract End Date/Time:** December 31, 2024

**Notice Type**
----------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Terms**
--------------

* **Location of Delivery:**
	+ **Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)**
* **Product Category:**
	+ *Lubricants, oils, greases, and anti-corrosive agents*

**Purpose and Details**
------------------------

* **Department of National Defence (DND)**
* **Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton**
* **Supply and delivery of Petroleum, Oils, and Lubricants (POL) products** on an as-and-when-requested basis
* **Contract period: January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2024**

**Equivalently important things to note**:

*   Contractors can review the solicitation documents on http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14838531.
*   The deadline for the request has already expired. Any supporting documentation and bid submissions are due on December 19, 2022, by 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsiveness.

**Contact Information**
------------------------

*   **Contact Name:** David Barltrop (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** [david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
